subsections.title: Glossary, Band Plans, Q Signals
subsections.label: subsec:glossary-band-q
prompts: Explain the purpose and structure of a glossary in the context of amateur radio.
Describe the significance of band plans in amateur radio operations.
Discuss the use and importance of Q signals in radio communication.

image_prompts.prompt: Diagram showing the structure of a typical amateur radio glossary.
image_prompts.caption: Structure of a typical amateur radio glossary.
image_prompts.label: fig:glossary-structure

image_prompts.caption: Band plan for a specific frequency range.

image_prompts.caption: Common Q signals used in amateur radio.
image_prompts.label: fig:q-signals

table_prompt.caption: Common Q signals and their meanings.
table_prompt.label: tab:q-signals

subsections.title: Phonetic Alphabet, Formulas
subsections.label: subsec:phonetic-formulas
prompts: Explain the importance of the phonetic alphabet in radio communication.
Discuss the role of formulas in understanding and designing radio circuits.
